attributes.action: Accept the challenge of linking both state pensions and MP pay to average earnings.  So, a 5% increase in average earnings would trigger an increase in both pensions and MP's pay.  Conversly, an increase in pay to MP's of 20% would be followed by a similar increase in pension, and a tax cut to wage-earners to equate to a 20% increase.  Thereby, no sector could get too far ahead of the other, nor be left behind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
